message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specific details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident you'll see the potential in it as well.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a limited-time offer, as I have another interested buyer willing to pay $800000. Let me know if you'd like to discuss this further.
